title: Me and the Master of Shadows just don't see eye to eye D; Halp.
body:
So, it's been a while that I've practising Zed now as he is the last mid laner left that I really wanna learn.

AND I JUST DO NOT SEEM TO CLICK WITH HIM.
In terms of general gameplay Harass/Builds/Skill Order/Laning Phase/ Skillshots/Splitpushing. That shit is fine. My problems start as soon as I press R on a League of Legends enemy champion. What do I do after I pop up from my ult? Like, what abilities, what order, and what do I do if they flash away or have lots and lots of moblity?

replies.body:
bash zed till he works properly.

(note: Your early r is really weak, zed r does massive damage when he gets rank 3 r and 350+ AD)

your combo depending on what you think you need is, rweq (w towards where they would run to escape, so if they do flash away you can easily catch upto them, e to slow them them aim q a small bit ahead to it will hit them if they don't move, but will hit them even if they run.) And req if you don't wish to waste your w. (req, sounds like wreck doesn't it? Means it will wreck them)
Well, off to normals I go
What I find is late game, all I have to do is E+Q+AA onto the ADC and I can basically just go back to my Death Mark Shadow after that as it'll be enough

r-e-botrk-q-e
or
r-e-botrk-w-q-e
save your q for when they're slowed, easier to hit.

> [{quoted}](name=GoldenTomat0,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=EeTzJh6l,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-03-16T09:25:12.102+0000)
>
>easier to shit.

I really hope that WASN'T a typo xD hahah

Hmmm.. Ok. I think one of the problems I have too is that I panic and rush the three seconds I have :/

> easier to shit

Guess who says that word a lot.

Zed's shadows serve two purpose.

1) To maximise damage output
2) Juking skillshots - Not just for fun but to avoid large amounts of damage in return.

Now since i learnt how to play Zed in Korean, i searched up some good Western Zed mains.


[](http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3F5C_xGIbH4)
Just mash your QWER keys, you'll kill people.
lel this is me. i tickle them when i ult
RIGHT?! This made me laugh so much btw xD
